title: Basketball Scoreboard Plugin Configuration
description: Configuration schema for the Basketball Scoreboard plugin - displays live, recent, and upcoming NBA, WNBA, NCAA Men's, and NCAA Women's basketball games

enabled.description: Enable or disable the basketball scoreboard plugin

display_duration.description: Duration in seconds for the display controller to show this plugin mode before rotating to next plugin

update_interval.description: How often to fetch new data in seconds

game_display_duration.description: Duration in seconds to show each individual game before rotating to the next game within the same mode

background_service.title: Background Service Settings
background_service.description: Configuration for background data fetching service

request_timeout.description: Request timeout in seconds for API calls

max_retries.description: Maximum number of retries for failed requests

enabled.description: Enable NBA games

favorite_teams.description: List of favorite NBA team abbreviations (e.g., LAL, BOS, GSW). Use 2-3 letter codes.

display_modes.title: Display Modes
display_modes.description: Control which game types to show

live_display_mode.description: Display mode for live games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

recent_display_mode.description: Display mode for recent games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

upcoming_display_mode.description: Display mode for upcoming games: 'switch' shows one game at a time, 'scroll' scrolls all games horizontally

scroll_settings.title: Scroll Settings
scroll_settings.description: Settings for scroll display mode (when display mode is set to 'scroll')

scroll_speed.description: Scroll speed in pixels per second (default: 50). Higher values scroll faster.

scroll_delay.description: Delay between scroll frames in seconds (default: 0.01 = 100 FPS). Lower values = smoother scrolling.

gap_between_games.description: Gap in pixels between game cards when scrolling

show_league_separators.description: Show league icons between different leagues

dynamic_duration.description: Automatically calculate display duration based on content width

game_card_width.description: Width of each game card in scroll mode (pixels). Default 128. Set lower on multi-panel chains to show more games simultaneously.

live_priority.description: Give live games priority over other modes. When enabled, live games will interrupt the normal mode rotation and be displayed immediately when available.

live_game_duration.description: Duration in seconds to display each live game before rotating to the next live game

live_update_interval.description: How often to update live game data (seconds)

update_interval_seconds.description: How often to fetch new data (seconds)

game_limits.title: Game Limits
game_limits.description: Control how many games to show

recent_games_to_show.description: With favorites: N games per favorite team. Without favorites: N total games sorted by time.

upcoming_games_to_show.description: With favorites: N games per favorite team. Without favorites: N total games sorted by time.

show_favorite_teams_only.description: Only show games from favorite teams

show_all_live.description: Show all live games, not just favorites

display_durations.description: How long to display games on screen (in seconds)

base.description: Base display duration for NBA games

live.description: Display duration for live NBA games

recent.description: Display duration for recent NBA games

upcoming.description: Display duration for upcoming NBA games

dynamic_duration.title: NBA Dynamic Duration Settings
dynamic_duration.description: Configure dynamic duration settings for NBA games.

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for NBA games

modes.title: Per-Mode Settings for NBA
modes.description: Configure dynamic duration for specific NBA modes

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for NBA live games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for NBA live games

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for NBA recent games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for NBA recent games

enabled.description: Enable dynamic duration for NBA upcoming games

max_duration_seconds.description: Max duration for NBA upcoming games

mode_durations.title: Mode-Level Durations
mode_durations.description: Control total duration for each mode type for NBA. If not set, uses dynamic calculation (total_games × per_game_duration).

recent_mode_duration.description: Total duration in seconds for Recent mode before rotating to next mode. Default: null (uses dynamic calculation). Set to null to use dynamic calculation. When mode cycles back, continues from last game shown (no repetition).

upcoming_mode_duration.description: Total duration in seconds for Upcoming mode before rotating to next mode. Default: null (uses dynamic calculation). Set to null to use dynamic calculation. When mode cycles back, continues from last game shown (no repetition).

march_madness.title: March Madness Settings
march_madness.description: Settings for NCAA Tournament (March Madness) display behavior

tournament_mode.description: Show ALL tournament games regardless of favorite teams. If not set, automatically enabled during the tournament window (March 10 - April 10)

show_seeds.description: Show tournament seeds (1-16) instead of AP rankings for tournament games

show_round.description: Show tournament round abbreviation (R64, R32, S16, E8, F4, NCG) in the status area

show_region.description: Show bracket region (E, W, S, MW) alongside round info

tournament_games_limit.description: Maximum number of non-favorite tournament games to show in Recent/Upcoming modes
